tasks.task: Demonstrate how to use Quick Lock fittings.
subtasks: Show different Quick Lock fittings (couplers, tees, elbows, plugs, adapters).
Explain the diameter (3/4 inch) of the Quick Lock coupling.
Illustrate the process of attaching the coupling by unscrewing the nut to expose the barb.
Point out the counterintuitive rotation direction of the nut.
Demonstrate wiggling the tube back and forth to seat it on the barb.
Demonstrate tightening the nut.
Explain the removable and reusable nature of Quick Lock fittings.
Demonstrate removal of the fitting by reversing the attachment process.
Specify that Quick Lock fittings are for drip systems only.
State the maximum operating pressure (45 psi).

tasks.task: Promote Sprinkler Warehouse and provide contact information.
subtasks: Mention the store's availability for all irrigation needs.
Encourage viewers to chat with customer service agents for assistance.
Invite subscribers for more helpful content.
Promote the user-friendly shop and compare web store.
Sign off with the presenter's name (Alfred Castillo) and title (Sprinkler Warehouse Pro).

tasks.task: Demonstrate how to use Quick Lock fittings. Then, list the steps:
So writing these as MAINTASKs with their respective subtasks.

Also, making sure the tasks are general and tasks would be performed by a person. For example, "Show different Quick Lock fittings" instead of just listing the types. Each main task would start with MAINTASK, then subtasks under that.
Demonstrate how to use Quick Lock fittings.
Promote Sprinkler Warehouse and customer service.

Explain the removable and reusable nature of Quick Lock fittings.
Demonstrate removal of the fitting by reversing the attachment process.
Specify that Quick Lock fittings are for drip systems only.
State the maximum operating pressure (45 psi).
